job.title: Machine Learning Engineer

The ideal candidate is also expected to mentor and work with a remarkably high performing software teamÂ ResponsibilitiesAs a senior staff member of a fast-growing early-stage startup, the Sr. ML Engineer will be accountable for Machine Learning and AI of the Data Secretsâ platform:Research, build and maintain Machine Learning models for highly scalable, performant and available platformIntegrate new data sources and workflows into the platformBuild and support machine learning workflows on the platformBuild distributed computing frameworks to process dataPerforms data analysis required to troubleshoot data related issuesBe an innovator and lead development of Intellectual Property of Data SecretsDrive innovation at the junction of cloud computing, distributed systems, data privacy and data sciencesWork closely with the product management team, and drive the ML technology & architectural aspects of the product roadmapWork closely with customers to build use cases and requirements for well-integrated solutionsAlign the product with industry security standards, data privacy regimes' compliancerequirements and certifications for each of the focus industry verticals.Evangelize Data Secrets in industry-wide AI and data privacy forums
